metadata.Title: CVE-2013-2045 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in lib/db.php in ownCloud Server 5.0.x before 5.0.6 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2045` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
